ghl.name: GoHighLevel MCP
ghl.description: CRM, marketing, commerce, and admin tools for GoHighLevel

apollo.name: Apollo MCP
apollo.description: B2B prospecting, enrichment, CRM, sequences, and outreach tools for Apollo.io

google_workspace.name: Google Workspace MCP
google_workspace.description: Gmail, Drive, Docs, Sheets, Slides, and Auth tools for Google Workspace

google_sheets.name: Google Sheets MCP
google_sheets.description: Spreadsheet data, formatting, charts, validation, formulas, financial modeling, and Drive tools for Google Sheets

fireflies.name: Fireflies MCP
fireflies.description: Meeting transcription, intelligence, action item extraction, and team analytics for Fireflies.ai

storeleads.name: StoreLeads MCP
storeleads.description: eCommerce store search, app intelligence, product data, list management, and historical analytics

tools.name: contacts_search
tools.description: Search contacts with filters. Find contacts by name, email, phone, tags, custom fields, date ranges, and more. Returns paginated results.

tools.name: contacts_get
tools.description: Get a single contact by ID. Returns full contact details including custom fields, tags, and attribution data.

tools.name: contacts_create
tools.description: Create a new contact. Provide at least name or email. Supports custom fields, tags, and DND settings.

parameters.name: assignedTo
parameters.description: User ID to assign contact to

tools.name: contacts_update
tools.description: Update an existing contact. Only include fields you want to change.

parameters.name: assignedTo
parameters.description: User ID to assign contact to

tools.name: contacts_upsert
tools.description: Create or update a contact. If matching contact found (by email or phone), it updates. Otherwise creates new.

parameters.name: assignedTo
parameters.description: User ID to assign contact to

tools.name: contacts_delete
tools.description: Permanently delete a contact. Cannot be undone. All associated data removed.

tools.name: contacts_find_duplicates
tools.description: Search for duplicate contacts by email or phone.

tools.name: contacts_add_tags
tools.description: Add one or more tags to a contact.

tools.name: contacts_remove_tags
tools.description: Remove one or more tags from a contact.

tools.name: contacts_bulk_tag_update
tools.description: Add or remove tags from multiple contacts at once.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Whether to add or remove the tags

tools.name: contacts_add_to_workflow
tools.description: Add a contact to a workflow/automation.

tools.name: contacts_remove_from_workflow
tools.description: Remove a contact from a workflow.

tools.name: contacts_add_to_campaign
tools.description: Add a contact to a campaign (drip sequence).

tools.name: contacts_remove_from_campaign
tools.description: Remove a contact from a specific campaign.

tools.name: contacts_remove_from_all_campaigns
tools.description: Remove a contact from ALL campaigns they are enrolled in.

tools.name: contacts_get_appointments
tools.description: Get all appointments/calendar events for a specific contact.

tools.name: contacts_add_follower
tools.description: Add a team member as a follower on a contact.

parameters.name: followers
parameters.description: User IDs to add as followers

tools.name: contacts_remove_follower
tools.description: Remove a team member as a follower from a contact.

tools.name: notes_list
tools.description: List all notes for a contact.

tools.name: notes_create
tools.description: Add a note to a contact. Use for call outcomes, meeting summaries, qualification data, objections, next steps, etc.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID of the note author

tools.name: notes_get
tools.description: Get a specific note by ID.

tools.name: notes_update
tools.description: Update an existing note on a contact.

tools.name: notes_delete
tools.description: Delete a note from a contact.

tools.name: tasks_list
tools.description: List all tasks for a contact.

tools.name: tasks_create
tools.description: Create a task/follow-up for a contact.

tools.name: tasks_get
tools.description: Get a specific task by ID.

tools.name: tasks_update
tools.description: Update a task. Reschedule, reassign, or modify details.

tools.name: tasks_complete
tools.description: Mark a task as completed.

tools.name: tasks_delete
tools.description: Delete a task from a contact.

tools.name: tasks_search
tools.description: Search tasks across all contacts. Find overdue tasks, tasks by user, etc.

parameters.name: dueDateStart
parameters.description: Filter tasks due after this date

parameters.name: dueDateEnd
parameters.description: Filter tasks due before this date

tools.name: conversations_search
tools.description: Search conversations across all contacts.

tools.name: conversations_get
tools.description: Get a specific conversation by ID.

tools.name: conversations_create
tools.description: Create a new conversation thread for a contact.

tools.name: conversations_update
tools.description: Update conversation properties (read/unread, star, assign).

parameters.name: unreadCount
parameters.description: Set unread count (0 = mark as read)

tools.name: conversations_delete
tools.description: Delete a conversation thread.

tools.name: messages_send
tools.description: Send a message via SMS, Email, WhatsApp, or other channels.

tools.name: messages_list
tools.description: List all messages in a conversation thread.

tools.name: messages_get
tools.description: Get a specific message by ID.

tools.name: messages_get_email
tools.description: Get full email message details including HTML body, headers, and thread info.

tools.name: messages_add_inbound
tools.description: Record an inbound message from a contact.

tools.name: messages_cancel_scheduled
tools.description: Cancel a message scheduled for future delivery.

tools.name: messages_cancel_scheduled_email
tools.description: Cancel a scheduled email message.

tools.name: messages_update_status
tools.description: Update delivery status of a message.

tools.name: messages_get_recording
tools.description: Get the recording URL for a phone call.

tools.name: messages_get_transcription
tools.description: Get the transcription text for a phone call.

tools.name: pipelines_list
tools.description: List all sales pipelines and their stages.

tools.name: opportunities_search
tools.description: Search opportunities/deals with filters.

tools.name: opportunities_get
tools.description: Get a specific opportunity/deal by ID.

tools.name: opportunities_create
tools.description: Create a new opportunity/deal in a pipeline.

tools.name: opportunities_update
tools.description: Update an opportunity/deal.

tools.name: opportunities_update_status
tools.description: Update just the status of an opportunity (won/lost/abandoned).

tools.name: opportunities_upsert
tools.description: Create or update an opportunity. Matches by pipeline + contact.

tools.name: opportunities_delete
tools.description: Delete an opportunity permanently.

tools.name: opportunities_add_follower
tools.description: Add a team member as a follower on a deal.

tools.name: opportunities_remove_follower
tools.description: Remove a follower from a deal.

tools.name: calendars_list
tools.description: List all calendars in the location.

tools.name: calendars_get
tools.description: Get details of a specific calendar.

tools.name: calendars_create
tools.description: Create a new calendar.

tools.name: calendars_update
tools.description: Update a calendar's settings.

tools.name: calendars_delete
tools.description: Delete a calendar.

tools.name: calendars_get_free_slots
tools.description: Get available time slots for a calendar within a date range.

tools.name: appointments_create
tools.description: Book an appointment for a contact on a calendar.

tools.name: appointments_get
tools.description: Get details of a specific appointment.

tools.name: appointments_update
tools.description: Update an appointment (reschedule, change status, etc.).

tools.name: appointments_delete
tools.description: Delete an appointment.

tools.name: appointments_list
tools.description: List appointments within a date range.

tools.name: calendars_create_block_slot
tools.description: Block a time slot on a calendar.

tools.name: calendars_get_blocked_slots
tools.description: Get all blocked time slots for a calendar.

tools.name: workflows_list
tools.description: List all workflows (automations) in the location. Note: GHL API only supports listing and adding/removing contacts.

tools.name: campaigns_list
tools.description: List all campaigns (drip sequences).

tools.name: campaigns_get_email_schedule
tools.description: Get the email sending schedule for campaigns.

tools.name: tags_list
tools.description: List all tags in the location.

tools.name: tags_create
tools.description: Create a new tag.

tools.name: tags_update
tools.description: Update (rename) a tag.

tools.name: tags_delete
tools.description: Delete a tag. Removes it from all contacts.

tools.name: custom_fields_list
tools.description: List all custom fields.

tools.name: custom_fields_create
tools.description: Create a new custom field.

tools.name: custom_fields_update
tools.description: Update a custom field definition.

tools.name: custom_fields_delete
tools.description: Delete a custom field and its values from all records.

tools.name: custom_values_list
tools.description: List all custom values (location-level variables).

tools.name: custom_values_create
tools.description: Create a new custom value (reusable variable like {{custom_values.company_phone}}).

tools.name: custom_values_update
tools.description: Update a custom value.

tools.name: custom_values_delete
tools.description: Delete a custom value.

tools.name: users_list
tools.description: List all users (team members) in the location.

tools.name: users_get
tools.description: Get details of a specific user/team member.

tools.name: users_search
tools.description: Search for users by name or other criteria.

tools.name: email_templates_list
tools.description: List all email templates.

tools.name: email_templates_create
tools.description: Create a new email template.

tools.name: email_templates_delete
tools.description: Delete an email template.

tools.name: email_verify
tools.description: Verify if an email address is valid and deliverable.

tools.name: social_media_list_posts
tools.description: List social media posts (scheduled, published, drafts, etc.).

tools.name: social_media_create_post
tools.description: Create and schedule a social media post across platforms.

parameters.name: accountIds
parameters.description: Social media account IDs to post to

tools.name: social_media_get_post
tools.description: Get details of a specific social media post.

tools.name: social_media_update_post
tools.description: Update a social media post.

tools.name: social_media_delete_post
tools.description: Delete a social media post.

tools.name: social_media_list_accounts
tools.description: List all connected social media accounts.

tools.name: social_media_get_stats
tools.description: Get social media posting statistics and engagement metrics.

tools.name: social_media_list_categories
tools.description: List social media post categories.

tools.name: blogs_list_sites
tools.description: List all blog sites.

tools.name: blogs_list_posts
tools.description: List all blog posts.

tools.name: blogs_create_post
tools.description: Create a new blog post.

tools.name: blogs_update_post
tools.description: Update an existing blog post.

tools.name: blogs_list_authors
tools.description: List all blog authors.

tools.name: blogs_list_categories
tools.description: List all blog categories.

tools.name: blogs_check_slug
tools.description: Check if a blog post URL slug is available.

tools.name: invoices_list
tools.description: List all invoices.

tools.name: invoices_get
tools.description: Get a specific invoice with full details.

tools.name: invoices_create
tools.description: Create a new invoice for a contact.

tools.name: invoices_update
tools.description: Update an existing invoice.

tools.name: invoices_delete
tools.description: Delete an invoice permanently.

tools.name: invoices_send
tools.description: Send an invoice to the contact via email with payment link.

tools.name: invoices_void
tools.description: Void an invoice (mark as cancelled without deleting).

tools.name: invoices_record_payment
tools.description: Record a manual payment against an invoice.

tools.name: invoices_generate_number
tools.description: Generate the next sequential invoice number.

tools.name: invoices_text2pay
tools.description: Send a Text2Pay SMS link for an invoice.

tools.name: orders_list
tools.description: List all orders/payments.

tools.name: orders_get
tools.description: Get a specific order by ID.

tools.name: transactions_list
tools.description: List payment transactions.

tools.name: subscriptions_list
tools.description: List all active and past subscriptions.

tools.name: coupons_list
tools.description: List all discount coupons/promo codes.

tools.name: products_list
tools.description: List all products/services.

tools.name: products_get
tools.description: Get a specific product with full details.

tools.name: products_create
tools.description: Create a new product or service listing.

tools.name: products_update
tools.description: Update a product's details.

tools.name: products_delete
tools.description: Delete a product.

tools.name: products_list_prices
tools.description: List all price variants for a product.

tools.name: products_create_price
tools.description: Add a price variant to a product.

tools.description: List all forms in the location.

tools.description: Get form submissions.

tools.name: surveys_list
tools.description: List all surveys.

tools.name: surveys_get_submissions
tools.description: Get survey submissions/responses.

tools.name: funnels_list
tools.description: List all funnels (landing pages and multi-step funnels).

tools.name: funnels_count_pages
tools.description: Get the total count of funnel pages.

tools.name: funnels_list_redirects
tools.description: List all funnel URL redirects.

tools.name: funnels_create_redirect
tools.description: Create a URL redirect for a funnel.

tools.name: media_list
tools.description: List media files and folders.

tools.name: media_delete
tools.description: Delete a file from the media library.

tools.name: location_get
tools.description: Get the current location (sub-account) details.

tools.name: location_update
tools.description: Update location/sub-account settings.

tools.name: locations_search
tools.description: Search across locations/sub-accounts (agency-level).

tools.name: location_list_templates
tools.description: List message templates for the location.

tools.name: location_get_timezones
tools.description: Get available timezones.

tools.name: businesses_list
tools.description: List all businesses/companies.

tools.name: businesses_get
tools.description: Get details of a specific business.

tools.name: businesses_create
tools.description: Create a new business/company record.

tools.name: businesses_update
tools.description: Update a business/company record.

tools.name: businesses_delete
tools.description: Delete a business/company record.

tools.name: custom_objects_list_schemas
tools.description: List all custom object schemas.

tools.name: custom_objects_get_schema
tools.description: Get a specific custom object schema definition.

tools.name: custom_objects_create_schema
tools.description: Create a new custom object schema (new data model).

tools.name: custom_objects_update_schema
tools.description: Update a custom object schema.

tools.name: custom_objects_create_record
tools.description: Create a new record in a custom object.

tools.name: custom_objects_get_record
tools.description: Get a specific record from a custom object.

tools.name: custom_objects_update_record
tools.description: Update a record in a custom object.

tools.name: custom_objects_delete_record
tools.description: Delete a record from a custom object.

tools.name: custom_objects_search_records
tools.description: Search records in a custom object with filters.

tools.name: links_list
tools.description: List all trigger links (trackable URLs that trigger workflows).

tools.name: links_create
tools.description: Create a new trigger link.

tools.name: links_update
tools.description: Update a trigger link.

tools.name: links_delete
tools.description: Delete a trigger link.

tools.name: documents_list
tools.description: List all documents and contracts.

tools.name: documents_send
tools.description: Send a document/contract for review and signature.

tools.name: documents_list_templates
tools.description: List all document/contract templates.

tools.name: associations_list
tools.description: List all association definitions (relationships between objects).

tools.name: associations_create
tools.description: Create a relationship between two records.

tools.name: phone_list_numbers
tools.description: List all phone numbers assigned to the location.

tools.name: phone_list_number_pools
tools.description: List number pools (groups of phone numbers).

tools.name: snapshots_list
tools.description: List all snapshots (full account templates). Agency-level feature.

tools.name: intelligence_contact_360
tools.description: Compact 360-degree view of a contact: profile, notes, tasks, conversations, opportunities, appointments. Pre-call prep tool.

tools.name: intelligence_morning_brief
tools.description: Daily SDR morning brief: today's appointments, due/overdue tasks, new contacts (24h), pipeline snapshot, unread conversations.

tools.name: intelligence_pipeline_health
tools.description: Pipeline health report: deal counts/values by stage, stalled deals flagged.

tools.name: intelligence_overdue_followups
tools.description: List of overdue tasks and stalled deals. One line per item.

tools.name: intelligence_conversation_history
tools.description: Message history for a contact across all channels. [IN/OUT] date (channel): message. Capped at 200 chars per message.

tools.name: intelligence_recent_activity
tools.description: Recent activity feed: conversations and new contacts in last N hours.

tools.name: intelligence_get_contact_context_for_draft
tools.description: Context for drafting a message to a contact: contact info, notes, recent messages, opportunity status, and drafting instructions.

tools.name: intelligence_pipeline_summary
tools.description: Summary of all pipelines: deal counts and values per stage.

tools.name: intelligence_followup_queue
tools.description: Prioritized daily follow-up work queue from a pipeline stage. One line per contact with IDs, name, phone, email, days since last contact, channel, touchpoint count, note snippet, and urgency flag.

tools.name: intelligence_contact_followup_brief
tools.description: Full follow-up brief for ONE contact. Everything needed to draft the next message: contact info, opportunity stage, notes, message thread, channel breakdown, and follow-up guidance.

parameters.name: opportunityId
parameters.description: Specific opportunity ID to focus on

tools.name: search_people
tools.description: Search Apollo's 270M+ contact database with precision filters. Build targeted prospect lists by job title, seniority, location, company size, industry, tech stack, and more. Returns profile data but NOT emails/phones  use enrich_person for contact details.

parameters.name: q_keywords
parameters.description: Keyword search across name, title, company, bio

tools.name: search_organizations
tools.description: Search Apollo's company database to find target accounts. Filter by employee count, HQ location, keywords, and more.

tools.name: get_organization
tools.description: Get complete details for a specific organization by Apollo ID. Returns full profile including funding, tech stack, headcount.

tools.name: get_organization_jobs
tools.description: View current job postings for a company. Useful for understanding hiring priorities and pain points before outreach.

tools.name: enrich_person
tools.description: Look up detailed info about a person  email, phone, title, company, employment history. Provide any combo of name, email, LinkedIn URL, company domain to match.

parameters.name: reveal_personal_emails
parameters.description: Set true to include personal emails

parameters.name: reveal_phone_number
parameters.description: Set true to include phone numbers (1 mobile credit)

tools.name: bulk_enrich_people
tools.description: Enrich up to 10 people simultaneously. Efficient for batch enrichment of prospect lists.

parameters.name: reveal_personal_emails
parameters.description: Set true to include personal emails

parameters.name: reveal_phone_number
parameters.description: Set true to include phone numbers

tools.name: enrich_organization
tools.description: Get comprehensive company data by domain  industry, employee count, revenue, funding, tech stack, LinkedIn, and more.

tools.name: bulk_enrich_organizations
tools.description: Enrich up to 10 companies simultaneously by domain.

tools.name: create_contact
tools.description: Add a new contact to your Apollo CRM. Set run_dedupe=true to prevent duplicates.

tools.name: update_contact
tools.description: Update an existing contact's information.

tools.name: search_contacts
tools.description: Search your Apollo CRM contacts. Filter by keywords, stage, and sort by activity/engagement.

tools.name: bulk_create_contacts
tools.description: Create up to 100 contacts at once with deduplication.

tools.name: list_contact_stages
tools.description: Get all contact pipeline stages (Cold, Approached, Replied, etc.) and their IDs for filtering and bulk updates.

tools.name: update_contact_stages
tools.description: Move contacts to a different pipeline stage.

tools.name: update_contact_owners
tools.description: Reassign contacts to a different team member.

tools.name: create_account
tools.description: Add a company to your Apollo CRM as a target account.

tools.name: update_account
tools.description: Update an existing account's details.

tools.name: search_accounts
tools.description: Search your Apollo CRM accounts by company name.

tools.name: bulk_create_accounts
tools.description: Create up to 100 accounts at once with deduplication.

tools.name: list_account_stages
tools.description: Get all account pipeline stages and their IDs.

tools.name: update_account_stages
tools.description: Move accounts to a different pipeline stage.

tools.name: update_account_owners
tools.description: Reassign accounts to a different team member.

tools.name: search_sequences
tools.description: Search your Apollo sequences (multi-touch outbound campaigns). View stats: delivery rates, open rates, click rates, reply rates.

tools.name: add_contacts_to_sequence
tools.description: Enroll contacts into an outbound sequence. Contacts must already exist in your CRM.

tools.name: update_sequence_contacts
tools.description: Remove, stop, or mark contacts as finished in a sequence.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Action to perform on the contacts

tools.name: create_deal
tools.description: Create a new deal/opportunity in your pipeline.

tools.name: list_deals
tools.description: List all deals/opportunities in your pipeline.

tools.name: get_deal
tools.description: View complete details for a specific deal.

tools.name: update_deal
tools.description: Update a deal's details  stage, value, close date, etc.

tools.name: list_deal_stages
tools.description: Get all deal pipeline stages with IDs, win/loss flags, and probability percentages.

tools.name: create_tasks
tools.description: Create tasks for follow-up actions  calls, manual emails, or action items. Assign to contacts with priorities and deadlines.

tools.name: search_tasks
tools.description: Search your Apollo task queue  calls, emails, action items.

tools.name: log_call
tools.description: Log a call record in Apollo for a contact. Track outcomes and maintain activity history for multi-touch outreach.

tools.name: search_calls
tools.description: Search call records in Apollo. Review history, outcomes, notes.

tools.name: update_call
tools.description: Update an existing call record.

tools.name: search_emails
tools.description: Search outreach emails sent through Apollo sequences. View delivery, open/click/reply tracking, and engagement timeline.

tools.name: get_email_stats
tools.description: Get detailed engagement stats for a specific outreach email  opens, clicks, replies, timestamps.

tools.name: list_email_accounts
tools.description: List all connected email accounts available for sending sequences. Returns account IDs, daily send limits, and sync status.

tools.name: apollo_health_check
tools.description: Verify your Apollo API connection is working.

tools.name: apollo_api_usage
tools.description: View current API usage stats and rate limits (minute/hourly/daily).

tools.name: list_labels
tools.description: Get all contact/account labels (tags) in your workspace. e.g. 'hot-lead', 'ecommerce', 'needs-cfo'

tools.name: list_custom_fields
tools.description: Get all custom fields  names, types, picklist values. Use system_name as key when setting custom_fields.

tools.name: create_custom_field
tools.description: Create a new custom field for contacts, accounts, or deals.

parameters.name: modality
parameters.description: Entity type the field applies to

tools.name: list_users
tools.description: Get all users in your Apollo team. Returns user IDs for assigning contacts, accounts, deals, and tasks.

tools.name: search_gmail_messages
tools.description: Search messages in Gmail. Returns Message IDs, Thread IDs, and links.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Token for pagination to retrieve the next page of results

tools.name: get_gmail_message_content
tools.description: Get full content of a specific Gmail message (subject, sender, recipients, body).

parameters.name: message_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Gmail message to retrieve

tools.name: get_gmail_messages_content_batch
tools.description: Get content of multiple Gmail messages in one batch. Max 25 per batch.

parameters.name: message_ids
parameters.description: List of Gmail message IDs to retrieve

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format of the returned message content (default "full")

tools.name: get_gmail_attachment_content
tools.description: Download the content of a specific email attachment.

parameters.name: message_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Gmail message containing the attachment

parameters.name: attachment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the attachment to download

tools.name: draft_gmail_message
tools.description: Create a draft email. Supports replies, attachments, and Send As aliases.

parameters.name: from_name
parameters.description: Sender display name for Send As alias

parameters.name: from_email
parameters.description: Sender email address for Send As alias

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: Thread ID to associate the draft with (for replies)

parameters.name: in_reply_to
parameters.description: Message-ID header of the message being replied to

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: List of attachment objects to include in the draft

tools.name: get_gmail_thread_content
tools.description: Get the complete conversation thread including all messages.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Gmail thread to retrieve

tools.name: get_gmail_threads_content_batch
tools.description: Get content of multiple Gmail threads in one batch. Max 25 per batch.

parameters.name: thread_ids
parameters.description: List of Gmail thread IDs to retrieve

tools.name: list_gmail_labels
tools.description: List all labels in the user's Gmail account.

tools.name: search_drive_files
tools.description: Search for files and folders in Google Drive, including shared drives.

parameters.name: drive_id
parameters.description: ID of a specific shared drive to search

parameters.name: include_items_from_all_drives
parameters.description: Whether to include items from all drives (default true)

parameters.name: corpora
parameters.description: Corpora to search (e.g., user, drive, allDrives)

tools.name: get_drive_file_content
tools.description: Get the content of a Drive file. Google Docs/Sheets/Slides exported as text/CSV. Office files parsed.

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Drive file to retrieve

tools.name: get_drive_file_download_url
tools.description: Get a download URL for a Drive file. Exports Google native files to PDF/DOCX/XLSX/CSV/PPTX.

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Drive file

parameters.name: export_format
parameters.description: Format to export Google native files to (e.g., PDF, DOCX, XLSX, CSV, PPTX)

tools.name: list_drive_items
tools.description: List files and folders in a Drive folder, supports shared drives.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: ID of the folder to list (default "root")

parameters.name: drive_id
parameters.description: ID of a specific shared drive

parameters.name: include_items_from_all_drives
parameters.description: Whether to include items from all drives (default true)

parameters.name: corpora
parameters.description: Corpora to search (e.g., user, drive, allDrives)

tools.name: create_drive_file
tools.description: Create a new file in Google Drive. Accepts direct content or a fileUrl.

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: Name of the file to create

parameters.name: fileUrl
parameters.description: URL to fetch file content from

tools.name: import_to_google_doc
tools.description: Import a file (Markdown, DOCX, TXT, HTML, RTF, ODT) into Google Docs format.

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: Name of the Google Doc to create

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to a file to import

parameters.name: file_url
parameters.description: URL to fetch file content from

parameters.name: source_format
parameters.description: Source file format (e.g., Markdown, DOCX, TXT, HTML, RTF, ODT)

tools.name: get_drive_file_permissions
tools.description: Get detailed metadata about a Drive file including sharing permissions.

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Drive file

tools.name: check_drive_file_public_access
tools.description: Search for a file by name and check if it has public link sharing enabled.

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: Name of the file to search for

tools.name: get_drive_shareable_link
tools.description: Get the shareable link for a Drive file or folder.

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Drive file or folder

tools.name: search_docs
tools.description: Search for Google Docs by name.

tools.name: get_doc_content
tools.description: Get content of a Google Doc or Drive file (.docx). Supports tabs.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Doc or Drive file

tools.name: list_docs_in_folder
tools.description: List Google Docs within a specific Drive folder.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: ID of the folder to list (default "root")

tools.name: update_google_doc
tools.description: Update a Google Doc by appending, prepending, or replacing content. No character indices needed.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Doc

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Content to write to the document

tools.name: create_doc
tools.description: Create a new Google Doc with optional initial content.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Title of the new Google Doc

tools.name: modify_doc_text
tools.description: Insert/replace text and/or apply formatting at specific character positions.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Doc

tools.name: find_and_replace_doc
tools.description: Find and replace text throughout a Google Doc.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Doc

tools.name: insert_doc_elements
tools.description: Insert structural elements (tables, lists, page breaks) into a Doc.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Doc

parameters.name: element_type
parameters.description: Type of structural element to insert

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Character index at which to insert the element

tools.name: insert_doc_image
tools.description: Insert an image into a Doc from Drive or URL.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Doc

parameters.name: image_source
parameters.description: URL or Drive file ID of the image

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Character index at which to insert the image

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Image width in points (default 0 for auto)

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Image height in points (default 0 for auto)

tools.name: update_doc_headers_footers
tools.description: Update headers or footers in a Google Doc.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Doc

parameters.name: section_type
parameters.description: Whether to update header or footer

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Content to set in the header or footer

tools.name: batch_update_doc
tools.description: Execute multiple document operations in a single atomic batch.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Doc

parameters.name: operations
parameters.description: List of document operations to execute

tools.name: inspect_doc_structure
tools.description: Find safe insertion points and understand document structure. Use before creating tables.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Doc

parameters.name: detailed
parameters.description: Whether to return detailed structure information (default false)

tools.name: create_table_with_data
tools.description: Create a table and populate it with data. Call inspect_doc_structure first for the index.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Doc

parameters.name: table_data
parameters.description: 2D array of strings representing table rows and cells

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Character index at which to insert the table

parameters.name: bold_headers
parameters.description: Whether to bold the first row as headers (default true)

tools.name: debug_table_structure
tools.description: Debug tool for inspecting table layout, cell positions, and content.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Doc

parameters.name: table_index
parameters.description: Index of the table to inspect (default 0)

tools.name: export_doc_to_pdf
tools.description: Export a Google Doc to PDF and save to Drive.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Doc

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: Drive folder ID to save the PDF in

tools.name: update_paragraph_style
tools.description: Apply paragraph formatting: headings (H1-H6), bullets, numbered lists, alignment, spacing, indentation.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Doc

parameters.name: start_index
parameters.description: Starting character index of the paragraph range

parameters.name: end_index
parameters.description: Ending character index of the paragraph range

parameters.name: space_above
parameters.description: Space above the paragraph in points

parameters.name: space_below
parameters.description: Space below the paragraph in points

parameters.name: list_type
parameters.description: Type of list formatting to apply

tools.name: read_document_comments
tools.description: Read all comments from a Google Document.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Document

parameters.description: The ID of the Google Document

parameters.name: comment_id

tools.description: Resolve a comment in a Google Document.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Document

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the comment to resolve

tools.name: list_spreadsheets
tools.description: List spreadsheets the user has access to.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of spreadsheets to return (default 25)

parameters.name: include_hyperlinks

parameters.name: values

parameters.name: clear_values
parameters.description: Whether to clear the range instead of writing (default false)

parameters.name: gradient_points

tools.name: start_google_auth
tools.description: Manually initiate Google OAuth flow. Legacy OAuth 2.0 only -- disabled when OAuth 2.1 is enabled. Usually not needed; auth happens automatically when you call any tool.

parameters.name: service_name
parameters.description: Name of the Google service to authenticate with

tools.name: create_spreadsheet
tools.description: Create a new blank Google Spreadsheet with a given title

tools.name: get_spreadsheet_info
tools.description: Get full metadata about a spreadsheet (sheets, properties, locale)

tools.name: list_spreadsheets
tools.description: List spreadsheets accessible to the service account, optionally filtered by folder

tools.name: add_sheet
tools.description: Add a new sheet/tab to an existing spreadsheet

tools.name: delete_sheet
tools.description: Delete a sheet/tab from a spreadsheet by name

tools.name: duplicate_sheet
tools.description: Duplicate an existing sheet/tab within the same spreadsheet

tools.name: rename_sheet
tools.description: Rename an existing sheet/tab

tools.name: set_sheet_properties
tools.description: Set sheet properties like hidden, tab color, frozen rows/columns, right-to-left

tools.name: reorder_sheets
tools.description: Reorder sheets/tabs by providing the desired order of sheet names

tools.name: copy_spreadsheet
tools.description: Make a full copy of an entire spreadsheet

tools.name: rename_spreadsheet
tools.description: Rename a spreadsheet's title

tools.name: copy_sheet_to
tools.description: Copy a single sheet/tab from one spreadsheet to another

tools.name: get_spreadsheet_url
tools.description: Get the URL and parent folder location of a spreadsheet

tools.name: read_range
tools.description: Read cell values from a specified range (e.g. Sheet1!A1:D10)

tools.name: batch_read
tools.description: Read multiple ranges in a single request

tools.name: write_range
tools.description: Write values to a specified range

tools.name: batch_write
tools.description: Write to multiple ranges in a single request

tools.name: append_rows
tools.description: Append rows of data after the last row with content

tools.name: clear_range
tools.description: Clear all values from a range (keeps formatting)

tools.name: insert_rows_columns
tools.description: Insert blank rows or columns at a given position

tools.name: delete_rows_columns
tools.description: Delete rows or columns at a given position

tools.name: sort_range
tools.description: Sort a range by one or more columns

tools.name: find_replace
tools.description: Find and replace text across a sheet or specific range

tools.name: move_range
tools.description: Cut and paste a range to a new location

tools.name: auto_fill
tools.description: Auto-fill a range based on a source pattern (like dragging a cell handle)

tools.name: format_cells
tools.description: Set font, size, bold, italic, colors, alignment, number format on a range

tools.name: set_borders
tools.description: Apply border styles to a range (top, bottom, left, right, inner)

tools.name: merge_cells
tools.description: Merge a range of cells into one

tools.name: unmerge_cells
tools.description: Unmerge previously merged cells in a range

tools.name: set_conditional_formatting
tools.description: Create conditional formatting rules (color scales, comparisons, custom formulas)

tools.name: clear_conditional_formatting
tools.description: Remove all conditional formatting rules from a sheet

tools.name: set_column_width
tools.description: Set the width of one or more columns

tools.name: set_row_height
tools.description: Set the height of one or more rows

tools.name: auto_resize_columns
tools.description: Auto-resize columns to fit their content

tools.name: group_rows_columns
tools.description: Group rows or columns (collapsible outline)

tools.name: ungroup_rows_columns
tools.description: Ungroup previously grouped rows or columns

tools.name: apply_financial_style
tools.description: Apply a predefined financial formatting style (input, formula, output, header, total, subtotal, currency, percent, accounting, multiple, date, negative_red)

tools.name: alternate_row_colors
tools.description: Apply alternating row colors (banding) to a range

tools.name: create_chart
tools.description: Create a chart (bar, line, pie, area, scatter, combo, waterfall, histogram, treemap, org, candlestick)

tools.name: update_chart
tools.description: Update an existing chart's type, ranges, title, or axis labels

tools.name: delete_chart
tools.description: Delete a chart by its ID

tools.name: list_charts
tools.description: List all charts in a spreadsheet with their metadata

tools.name: create_sparkline
tools.description: Insert a SPARKLINE formula into a cell

tools.name: set_data_validation
tools.description: Set data validation rules on a range (number ranges, date ranges, text, custom formula)

tools.name: set_dropdown
tools.description: Create a dropdown list in a range from a list of allowed values

tools.name: set_checkbox
tools.description: Add checkboxes to a range with optional custom checked/unchecked values

tools.name: clear_data_validation
tools.description: Remove all data validation from a range

tools.name: create_named_range
tools.description: Create a named range for easy reference in formulas

tools.name: list_named_ranges
tools.description: List all named ranges in a spreadsheet

tools.name: delete_named_range
tools.description: Delete a named range by its name

tools.name: update_named_range
tools.description: Update the range or name of an existing named range

tools.name: protect_range
tools.description: Protect a cell range so only specified editors can modify it

tools.name: protect_sheet
tools.description: Protect an entire sheet, optionally leaving some ranges unprotected

tools.name: unprotect
tools.description: Remove protection from a range or sheet by its protection ID

tools.name: list_protected_ranges
tools.description: List all protected ranges and sheets in a spreadsheet

tools.name: get_formulas
tools.description: Get all formulas from a range (shows formulas instead of computed values)

tools.name: analyze_sheet_formulas
tools.description: Analyze all formulas in a sheet: counts, types, and locations

tools.name: trace_cell_dependencies
tools.description: Trace which cells a given cell depends on (precedents) and which depend on it (dependents)

tools.name: find_errors
tools.description: Scan a sheet for all cells containing errors (#REF!, #DIV/0!, #VALUE!, etc.)

tools.name: audit_model
tools.description: Audit a financial model: find hardcoded numbers in formula ranges, inconsistent formulas across rows, circular refs

tools.name: create_formula_map
tools.description: Create a visual map showing formula structure across a sheet (which cells are inputs, formulas, or errors)

tools.name: create_financial_model
tools.description: Create a templated financial model (three_statement, dcf, budget, lbo, comps, portfolio) with pre-built structure and formulas

tools.name: create_sensitivity_table
tools.description: Create a sensitivity/data table that varies two inputs and shows impact on an output

tools.name: calculate_financial_ratios
tools.description: Calculate financial ratios (liquidity, profitability, leverage, efficiency) from balance sheet and income statement ranges

tools.name: create_amortization_schedule
tools.description: Create a loan amortization schedule with payment, interest, and principal breakdown

tools.name: create_depreciation_schedule
tools.description: Create a depreciation schedule (straight-line, double-declining, or sum-of-years-digits)

tools.name: create_wacc_calculator
tools.description: Create a weighted average cost of capital (WACC) calculator sheet

tools.name: create_pivot_table
tools.description: Create a pivot table from a data range with configurable rows, columns, values, and filters

tools.name: delete_pivot_table
tools.description: Delete a pivot table by its ID

tools.name: add_comment
tools.description: Add a threaded comment to a cell (visible in the comment sidebar)

tools.name: list_comments
tools.description: List all threaded comments in a spreadsheet

tools.name: add_note
tools.description: Add a note to a cell (the yellow sticky note that appears on hover)

tools.name: clear_note
tools.description: Remove a note from a cell

tools.name: share_spreadsheet
tools.description: Share a spreadsheet with a user, group, or domain (reader, commenter, writer, owner)

tools.name: get_sharing_settings
tools.description: Get all current sharing permissions on a spreadsheet

tools.name: remove_sharing
tools.description: Remove a specific user's or group's access from a spreadsheet

tools.name: export_to_pdf
tools.description: Export a spreadsheet or specific sheet to PDF (returns download URL)

tools.name: export_to_csv
tools.description: Export a sheet to CSV format (returns the CSV text)

tools.name: create_folder
tools.description: Create a new folder in Google Drive, optionally inside a parent folder

tools.name: list_folders
tools.description: List folders in Drive, optionally scoped to a parent folder

tools.name: move_file
tools.description: Move a file or spreadsheet from one folder to another

tools.name: get_file_info
tools.description: Get metadata for any file (name, type, size, parents, URL, last modified)

tools.name: list_folder_contents
tools.description: List all files and subfolders inside a specific folder

tools.name: delete_file
tools.description: Move a file or folder to the trash

tools.name: rename_file
tools.description: Rename any file or folder in Drive

tools.name: share_folder
tools.description: Share a folder (and all its contents) with a user, group, or domain

tools.name: create_spreadsheet_in_folder
tools.description: Create a new spreadsheet directly inside a specific folder

tools.name: search_drive
tools.description: Full-text search across all accessible files in Google Drive

tools.name: list_transcripts
tools.description: List and filter meeting transcripts. Supports pagination, date ranges, participant/organizer filters, and keyword search. Returns summary metadata for each match. Use this as your starting point to find meetings.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of transcripts to return (1-50, default 20)

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Get transcripts for a specific team member

tools.name: search_transcripts
tools.description: Search across all transcripts by keyword, with optional date range and participant/organizer filters. Returns matching transcripts with their overview and keywords. Use this to find meetings about a specific topic, client, or project.

tools.name: get_transcript
tools.description: Get complete transcript details by ID, including metadata, full sentence-level transcript with speaker attribution, AI-generated summary, action items, and analytics. This is the most comprehensive view of a single meeting.

tools.name: get_transcript_summary
tools.description: Get the AI-generated summary for a meeting  overview, action items, key topics, keywords, outline, chapters, and meeting type. Much faster and lighter than the full transcript.

tools.name: get_transcript_sentences
tools.description: Get the full sentence-level transcript with speaker names, timestamps, and AI filters (sentiment, tasks, pricing, questions, metrics, dates). Supports filtering by speaker or AI filter type. Use for detailed transcript review or extracting specific content types.

parameters.name: speaker_name
parameters.description: Filter to a specific speaker (partial match)

parameters.name: filter_type
parameters.description: Only return sentences where this AI filter has a value

tools.name: get_transcript_analytics
tools.description: Get meeting analytics including sentiment analysis, speaker statistics (talk time, word count, WPM, filler words, questions asked, monologue patterns), and content categories. Useful for evaluating engagement, preparation, and communication dynamics.

tools.name: get_action_items
tools.description: Extract action items and tasks from a meeting transcript. Returns the AI-generated action items plus any sentences flagged as tasks by the AI filter. Essential for tracking deliverables and follow-ups from client meetings.

tools.name: get_pricing_discussions
tools.description: Extract all pricing-related statements from a meeting. Surfaces any sentences flagged by the AI pricing filter  rate discussions, cost mentions, budget references, etc. Critical for professional services proposals and SOW tracking.

tools.name: get_questions
tools.description: Extract all questions asked during a meeting. Surfaces sentences flagged as questions by AI, grouped by speaker. Useful for understanding client concerns, discovery calls, and ensuring no question went unanswered.

tools.name: get_dates_and_deadlines
tools.description: Extract all date and deadline references from a meeting. Surfaces sentences flagged with date/time mentions by the AI filter. Use for tracking commitments, milestones, and delivery timelines discussed in client meetings.

tools.name: get_metrics
tools.description: Extract all metric and number references from a meeting  KPIs, percentages, dollar amounts, quantities, etc. Useful for tracking discussed metrics, performance numbers, and quantitative commitments.

tools.name: get_sentiment_by_speaker
tools.description: Get per-sentence sentiment breakdown for a meeting, optionally filtered by speaker. Returns sentiment-tagged statements showing positive, negative, and neutral moments. Use for gauging client satisfaction and meeting tone.

parameters.name: speaker_name
parameters.description: Filter to a specific speaker (partial match)

tools.name: get_meeting_attendees
tools.description: Get detailed attendee information for a meeting  names, emails, phone numbers, and locations. Useful for identifying client contacts and verifying meeting attendance.

tools.name: get_user
tools.description: Get information about the current authenticated user or a specific team member  email, name, number of transcripts, minutes consumed, integrations, and admin status.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Optional. If omitted, returns current user.

tools.name: get_team_users
tools.description: Get all users in the Fireflies team  their names, emails, transcript counts, minutes consumed, and admin status. Use for team overview and resource tracking.

tools.name: get_ai_app_results
tools.description: Get AI App outputs for a specific app or transcript. Fireflies AI Apps run custom extraction prompts against meetings. Use this to retrieve structured outputs from any configured AI App.

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: The AI App ID (at least one of app_id or transcript_id required)

parameters.name: transcript_id
parameters.description: The transcript ID (at least one of app_id or transcript_id required)

tools.name: upload_audio
tools.description: Upload an audio or video file URL for Fireflies to transcribe. Supports mp3, mp4, and wav. Optionally specify attendees and a webhook for completion notification.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Direct, publicly accessible URL to the file

parameters.name: webhook
parameters.description: URL to notify when transcription completes

tools.name: delete_transcript
tools.description: Delete a transcript by ID. Requires admin privileges. Rate-limited to 10 requests per minute. Returns confirmation with deleted transcript metadata.

tools.name: create_soundbite
tools.description: Create a soundbite (clip) from a transcript at a specific time range. Useful for highlighting key moments, client quotes, or important decisions.

tools.name: update_meeting_title
tools.description: Update the title of a meeting transcript. Useful for standardizing meeting names across your CRM/project naming conventions.

tools.name: search_stores
tools.description: Search and filter eCommerce stores with 50+ combinable filters. Supports platform (Shopify, WooCommerce, BigCommerce, etc.), country, category, traffic range, revenue range, product count, employee count, apps installed, technologies, pricing plan, theme, location (city/state/region), language, currency, creation date, app spend, social presence, shipping carriers, and platform migration history. Returns 10 results per page by default (max 50). Results include: domain, merchant name, title, platform, plan, country, rank, monthly visits, monthly sales, product count, employee count, top categories, creation date, app spend, currency, and location.

tools.name: get_store_details
tools.description: Get comprehensive details for a single store by domain name. Returns core metrics plus collapsed app names (top 15), technology names (top 15), contacts (type + value), description, rank percentile, pageviews, average price, variant/vendor counts, language, theme info, sales channels, previous platform, and OG image.

tools.name: lookup_domain_by_name
tools.description: Find a store's domain from a company or brand name using fuzzy matching. Returns top 5 matches ranked by likelihood. Use when you know the brand but not the URL.

tools.name: search_apps
tools.description: Search eCommerce platform app stores (Shopify, BigCommerce, etc.) by platform, category, or keyword. Returns: name, token, platform, URL, rating, review count, install count, 30-day installs, 90-day installs, categories, launch date. 10 results per page default.

tools.name: get_app_details
tools.description: Get full details for a specific app by identifier (format: platform.token, e.g. "shopify.klaviyo"). Returns: name, rating, install counts, categories, launch date, description, pricing, and plan breakdowns (name + price only).

tools.name: get_app_reviews
tools.description: Get merchant reviews for a specific app. Returns: rating, body text, author, date, and locale. 10 reviews per page default.

tools.name: get_technology_details
tools.description: Get details about a specific third-party technology tracked by StoreLeads (analytics tools, marketing pixels, CDNs, payment processors, etc.). Returns: name, description, install count, categories.

tools.name: list_technologies
tools.description: List all third-party technologies StoreLeads tracks. Returns: name, install count, categories. 20 per page default.

tools.name: get_store_products
tools.description: Get a store's product catalog. Returns: title, handle, price, vendor, product type, published date. 10 products per page default. Sortable by price, title, or published date.

tools.name: get_social_media_account
tools.description: Get social media stats for a specific handle on a specific network. Supported networks: Instagram, TikTok, Twitter, Facebook, Pinterest, Snapchat, YouTube, Yelp. Returns: handle, network, followers, following, posts, category, 90-day follower change.

tools.name: get_store_contacts
tools.description: Extract all contact info for a store. Returns: domain, merchant name, and contacts array with type (email/phone/twitter/facebook/instagram/pinterest/tiktok/youtube/snapchat/linkedin/yelp) and value.

tools.name: get_lists
tools.description: Get all StoreLeads lists on your account. Returns list names, IDs, and domain counts. Lists integrate with webhooks, CRMs (HubSpot, Salesforce), and export.

tools.name: get_list_details
tools.description: Get domains in a specific list with their store data (same slim fields as search_stores). 10 per page default.

tools.name: add_domains_to_list
tools.description: Add one or more domains to a list by domain name. Triggers any workflow webhooks attached to the list.

tools.name: remove_domains_from_list
tools.description: Remove one or more domains from a list.

tools.name: clear_list
tools.description: Remove ALL domains from a list (truncate). List itself is preserved.

tools.name: get_historical_store_data
tools.description: Get historical snapshots for a store. Track platform migrations, traffic trends, product count changes, rank changes over time. Returns: domain, platform, rank, monthly visits, monthly sales, product count, plan.

tools.name: list_historical_labels
tools.description: List all available historical snapshot time periods. Use these labels with get_historical_store_data.

tools.name: list_historical_domains
tools.description: List domains that have historical data available. 10 per page default.

tools.name: export_stores
tools.description: Bulk export stores matching filter criteria (same filters as search_stores). Designed for large result sets. Auto-applies slim field set to prevent massive payloads.
